an4.129:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.
an4.129:4.3: If an assembly of monks goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.129:4.4: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.129:4.5: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.129:7.1: or laywomen goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.129:7.2: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.129:7.3: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.129:7.4: These are the four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.”
